content: i m happy to offer betty s bandana as a free pattern originally developed for my beginner knit class at betty s books in webster groves if you re local we d love to see you this project is knit flat in garter stitch and shaped with yarn-over increases betty s bandana is written as an os customizable pattern -- choose your yarn select a 32 circular needle 1 to 2 sizes larger than recommended for your yarn and get to knitting my small bandana was made with 130 yards of fingering-weight yarn on size us 3 needles - wingspan 31 - depth 7 my large bandana was made with 210 yards of dk-weight yarn on size us 7 needles - wingspan 50 - depth 15 5 please note that this pattern has not been professionally reviewed please reach out to me with any questions and i ll be happy to help i would love to see your finished projects on ravelry or instagram @oldehoeft
